description.value: This code system includes concepts for responses from a person regarding whether or not they have a known variation of a sex characteristics. Variations of sex characteristics refers innate genetic, hormonal or physical sex characteristics that do not conform to medical norms for female or male bodies. The concepts defined in this code system are wider to those defined in the ABS Standard for Sex, Gender, Variations of Sex Characteristics and Sexual Orientation Variables which restricts values to whether a person was born with a variation of a sex characteristics.

definition.value: Persons who know they have a variation of sex characteristics.
Persons who know they do not have a variation of sex characteristics.
